column4: I am runnig webmin 4.10, and after my upgrade to 8.04. none of the modules seem to be linkking correctly. Does anyone use webmin and have this problem/know how to fix it?
And by linking correctly, I mean, I click on networking, and it says "Error - File not Found"
no he needs to change the permissions to his own user from root
ah, I wasn't here for the first part of the problem, sorry
